snippet.title: MK Defenders of the Earth v4.0 | Trailer#2
snippet.description:
First of all thank you all for following my project. It is thanks to all of you that I decided to continue and improve this game.

MK Defenders of the Earth is a non-profit fan-game created by Daniloabella based on the classic games of the MK saga.

Powered on Mugen, this game uses Borg117's Season 2 FINAL (PATCH 4) as the base and material of the MKP 4.1 by MKP Team.

MK Defenders of the Earth returns with version 4.0!!
Introducing new stages, music, sfx, a launcher, and yes!... chars sprites remastered using Season 2 FINAL!!!

The game will be available in:

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/MKDEv32/84520

All information about the new version is now available at:

Game Page: https://daniloabella.com/mkdote
Blog: http://mkdefenderearth.blogspot.cl

For any questions send an email to daniloabella@gmail.com.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Song: Imprisoned Angel
Artist: Mattia Turzo
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3kWF9Qis7Jk&ab_channel=MattiaTurzo

WB GAMES LOGO, WBIE LOGO, WB SHIELD, NETHERREALM STUDIOS LOGO, MORTAL KOMBAT, THE DRAGON LOGO, and all related characters and elements are trademarks of and © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. (s20)
